thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Deutsche Boerse CEO Says Not Aiming For Revolutionary Change With Strategic Review To Be Published At End May

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Deutsche Boerse CEO Says Not Aiming For Revolutionary Change With Strategic Review To Be Published At End May
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Deutsche Boerse:
* CEO SAYS NOT AIMING FOR REVOLUTIONARY CHANGE WITH STRATEGIC REVIEW TO BE PUBLISHED AT END MAY
* CEO SAYS JOB CUTS NOT UP FOR DEBATE * CEO SAYS BOERSE DOESN‘T SEE ITSELF AS A TAKEOVER TARGET
* CFO SAYS 2017 BOARD BONUSES WILL BE “CLEARLY” BELOW 2016
* CEO SAYS HAS 1.3 BILLION EUROS ON HAND FOR ACQUISITIONS * CEO SAYS WANTS TO HAVE A 25 PERCENT MARKET SHARE IN EURO CLEARING
* CFO SAYS WANTS TO ACHIEVE 25 PERCENT MARKET SHARE IN EURO CLEARING BY 2019, 70 MILLION EUR IN ADDITIONAL REVENUE Further company coverage:
